3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D transformation with clear wall thickness, proper corner geometry, and a perfect isometric angle.

geometric_accuracy.notes: High fidelity to the 2D plan. The 3D model captures the stairs, utility areas, and room adjacencies perfectly. Minor omission of one interior door leaf detail.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture aligns remarkably well with the 2D layout, including kitchen island, dining set, and bedroom arrangement. Bathroom fixtures are simplified but present.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean, professional render. Consistent materiality. Exterior plants are even preserved from the 2D sketch.

detected_errors.description: Some interior door swings are represented as open gaps rather than rendering the door panels themselves.

summary: A highly accurate and geometrically faithful 3D conversion that meticulously follows the provided 2D architectural layout.
